Package com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.userservice.user.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.userservice.user.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("${api.base-path}") public class UserController extends Object
Controller for handling user-related operations.

This controller exposes endpoints for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting user information.

      principal - the authenticated user's principal

      Parameters:
      principal - the authenticated user's principal
      Returns:
      the details of the authenticated user

    • getUserDetailsById

      @GetMapping("/{userId}/details") public UserDetailsDto getUserDetailsById(@PathVariable String userId, Principal principal)
      Fetches the detailed information of a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose details are to be fetched
      principal - the authenticated user's principal
      Returns:
      the detailed information of the specified user

    • createUser

      @PostMapping("/me") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserInfoDto> createUser(@RequestBody UserCreateDto createUserDto, Principal principal)
      Creates a new user with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      createUserDto - the user details to be created
      principal - the authenticated user's principal
      Returns:
      the created user's information

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/me") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserInfoDto> updateUser(@RequestBody UserCreateDto updateUserDto, Principal principal)
      Updates the user information for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      updateUserDto - the user details to be updated
      principal - the authenticated user's principal
      Returns:
      the updated user's information

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("/me") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteUser(Principal principal)
      Deletes the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      principal - the authenticated user's principal
      Returns:
      a response indicating that the user was deleted

    • searchUsers

      @GetMapping("/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<UserInfoDto>> searchUsers(@RequestParam String name, Principal principal)
      Searches for users whose first name starts with the given term.
      Parameters:
      name - the name term to search for
      principal - the authenticated user's principal
      Returns:
      a list of users matching the search criteria
